translations: 你干嘛（What are you 缩略语，非正式）

sentences.sentence: So, whatcha doing when you get there?
sentences.translation: 那么，到了以后，你们去做什么呢？

sentences.sentence: Cabb Driver: Get a little farther away from the cab next time, Mac… Here it is, whatcha gonna do? When you get up there? Spit off the top?
sentences.translation: 出租车司机：下次别靠车太近，麦克……到了，你上去干什么？从顶层往下吐痰吗？ ？
